name: DEFENSE OF TURRETS
description:
It's not so easy to pass maps.

Show your intelligence and challenge your friends by playing Defense of Turrets!

This game will hook you for hours!

Top Features

► 3 specialized upgradable turrets to customize your strategy! (Shooter, Laser Beamer, Missile Launcher.)

► Over 4 different enemies, from "Fast" to "Though" each with their own skills! (Beware of the "Tenacious"!)

► No Ads!

Command your turrets;

♦ Set your strategy, make your move!

♦ Move wisely and experience epic fights!
